topicSummary: Brain and central nervous system cancers.Consider a very urgent referral for suspected brain or central nervous system

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Childhood cancers - recognition and referral: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) quality standards for suspected cancer have been added to this topic.

latestChanges.title: CKS topic revised
latestChanges.body: This topic is a direct implementation of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guidelineSuspected cancer: recognition and referral NICE, 2015. This CKS topic replaces the former topic on Children's tumours - suspected.
